July 16, 1938 D Salford Public Assistance Board Contest
Salford Public Assistance Board Contest 0 Own Choice Test Piece Contest
salford-public-assistance-board-contest
None
March Contest
Grounds of Old Peoples Home, Pendleton, Salford, Lancashire Prizes - 1st £15, 2nd £10, 3rd £8 and 7 consolation prizes of £5. Contest organised by Public Assistance Board to show appreciation to all bands that had given free concerts at local hospital. (Source Musical Progress and Mail August 1938) 10 bands competed
Jan. 20, 2014, 12:10 p.m. Jan. 23, 2019, 10:50 a.m.
